title: Addition and Animals
summary: A fun series where addition is taught using colourful cartoon animals.

title: Reading Aloud with Robert the Rhubarb
summary: An exciting, rhubarb themed reading and literacy series.

title: Vegetables and Fruits Spelling Bee
summary: A series that aims to teach initial spelling skills using nature's own fruits and vegetables.

title: Spelling in Space
summary: A fun series that teaches spelling skills with exciting objects from space, such as the moon and a rocket.

title: Maths Magic
summary: A new series that sets up the foundation for an education in magic, through the relatable medium of maths.

title: Music Time
summary: An all-time classic sing-along series that gives children a first sense of the miracle of music.

title: My First Friendship
summary: A narrative series that aims to build social skills and emotional intelligence through the story of a young child and their first friend.

title: Good Foods - Happy Tum Tum
summary: A new, research-based learning series on the benefits of a good diet, and how to build one - for kids.

title: LEGO - Build and Believe
summary: A partership with LEGO sees this series teach the joy of building.
